name: 001 The Schrödinger's Cat
description:
A text-based interactive fiction about a real life application of the Schrödinger's Cat Theory.

CONTENT WARNING:  

  • Off-screen Violence
  • Depiction of Firearms

This game is inspired by the Schrödinger's Cat Theory:

The Schrödinger's Cat Theory is a hypothetical experiment where a cat is placed in a box with a chance of survival or death.  Whilst the status of the cat is unknown, it is considered to be both alive and dead simultaneously. This inspired:

  • A textbox designed after graphs of the superposition of waves.
  • A cat mascot that displays being both alive and dead.
  • A box character reminiscent of the theory.
  • A situation reminiscent of the theory.

Release Date: February 14th 2021

Happy Valentine's Day! ;)
